rules: Rule1: If the platform has the multiplayer feature, then the game requires server capacity as a resource.
Rule2: Whenever the platform announces a tournament as an event, it achieves the goal of user satisfaction.

Rule3: If the monitoring system detects a traffic spike anomaly, then in the case where it is not true that if the game requires server capacity as a resource then the game has optimal performance, the system triggers an alert for performance degradation.
Rule4: Either the monitoring system detects a traffic spike anomaly or it detects a hardware failure anomaly.

Rule5: In the event that the monitoring system detects a hardware failure anomaly, then should it not be the case that if the game requires server capacity as a resource then the game has optimal performance, the system triggers an alert for performance degradation.
Rule6: If the admin performs emergency maintenance, then the platform experiences a scheduled outage.
Rule7: Either the admin ignores the safety protocol or if the admin authorizes maintenance as an action then the admin performs emergency maintenance.
Rule8: Provided that the game has optimal performance, the platform achieves the goal of user satisfaction.
Rule9: Should the developer use analytics software as a tool, then the admin monitors the server load of the system.
Rule10: The developer uses analytics software as a tool or the developer uses a debugging tool as a tool.
Rule11: Whenever the developer uses a debugging tool as a tool, then if the game requires server capacity as a resource, the game has optimal performance.

Rule12: Either the developer publishes a patch as an update or if the admin monitors the server load of the system then whenever the game requires server capacity as a resource, the game has optimal performance.
Rule13: If the developer releases an expansion as content, then the admin authorizes maintenance as an action.
Rule14: The developer releases an expansion as content or the platform announces a tournament as an event.
Rule15: If it is not true that whenever the game requires server capacity as a resource then the game has optimal performance, then the system does not trigger an alert for performance degradation.

Rule16: In the case where it is not the case that if the developer releases an expansion as content then the platform experiences a scheduled outage, the user violates the terms of service by cheating.
facts: Fact1: The platform has the multiplayer feature.
Fact2: It is not the case that the user violates the terms of service by cheating.
Fact3: The admin does not ignore the safety protocol.
Fact4: The developer does not publish a patch as an update.
Fact5: The platform does not experience a scheduled outage.

question: The platform achieves the goal of user satisfaction.
